author: Scott van den Oever
life_text: The Notorious B.I.G., Biggie, or Biggie Smalls was an American rapper. He is ranked by Billboard as among the ten greatest rappers of all time. He was raised in the Brooklyn borough of New York City. When he released his debut album Ready to Die in 1994, he became a central figure in the East Coast hip hop scene and increased New York City's visibility in the genre at a time when West Coast hip hop was dominant in the mainstream.
hit_text: ‘Juicy’ is the first single by American hip hop artist The Notorious B.I.G. from his 1994 debut album Ready to Die. The song is considered by Rolling Stone, The Source and About.com as one of the greatest hip-hop songs of all time.
facts1: Biggie's Parents were born in Jamaica
facts3: Michael Jackson used Biggie for a verse
